description: This file defines the WorkflowSession dataclass used for storing and managing workflow session data in a database, including methods for serialization, deserialization, and data retrieval.

classes.name: WorkflowSession
classes.description: A dataclass representing a workflow session with methods for converting to dictionary, extracting monitoring and telemetry data, and creating instances from dictionaries.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Converts the WorkflowSession instance to a dictionary.

methods.name: monitoring_data
methods.description: Returns the session data as a dictionary for monitoring purposes.

methods.name: telemetry_data
methods.description: Provides telemetry data including creation and update timestamps.

methods.name: from_dict
methods.description: Creates a WorkflowSession instance from a dictionary, with validation for session_id.
